items.text: length ball outside off again, and cut away sharply to the fielder in the deep
full outside off, and he pushes at this for a single. Goes to long off on this occasion
flat outside leg, and spinning down the leg side. Tamim happily lets it go
full on leg stump, and he's down on one knee! Slog sweeps over short fine leg, and the ball soars over the boundary for a maximum. He's on 98 now
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, SIX runs

items.text: full just outside leg, and he taps this to square leg. Moves on to 99*
length ball outside off, but spinning further away. Mahmudullah makes some extra room and then cuts to point
full on leg, and he works it away to the sweeper fielder on the leg side
full just outside off, and he defends towards the off side. Wants a single, but the ball's gone nowhere. He scampers back
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full and wide, but the drive goes straight to the cover fielder
length ball on leg stump, and Mahmudullah punches this to cover point for a single. Gives Tamim the strike
full on middle, and driven to long off for a jogging single. Tamim's 11th ODI hundred. Mahmudullah congratulates his partner.
in the slot, and dispatched away! Full on off, and Mahmudullah backs away, takes a big backlift, and then smashes it over Nurse's head
good length on leg stump, and that's been worked off his pads to Gayle to deep midwicket. Played with such soft hands that they can come back for the second
overpitched on middle, and that's been shoveled to Gayle at short midwicket
full on middle, and Tamim goes to the off side to sweep very fine. Mistimes to short fine leg, but Tamim's in pain! Wonder if he pulled a muscle near his glutes
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full toss on off, and Tamim drives firmly to deep extra cover for a couple
length ball on off, and that's been punched down the ground to long on

items.preText: Good spirit on display. Nurse shook Tamim's hand after the end of his spell to congratulate the man on his hundred
items.text: wide outside off, and enough time to cut it away to the fielder in the deep. Bangladesh's 200 too!
items.postText: Bangladesh took 47 balls to go from 150 to 200.

items.text: taken by square leg diving to his right! Full on middle, and Tamim tries to slog sweep behind square. Whips this away off his legs, but the ball doesn't get the elevation, and this time Tamim must walk back
items.postText: Standing ovation welcomes Tamim back into the pavillion.

dismissal.text: Tamim Iqbal c KOA Powell b Bishoo 103 (124b 7x4 2x6) SR: 83.06

items.preText: Mashrafe in at No. 6. He possesses a long bat handle.
items.text: welcomes him with the wrong'un. Length ball angling into the batsman, and he flicks it away to square leg for one
slower ball, on a length outside off. Mortaza's through his attempted punch too early, and the ball takes an inside edge to the keeper
items.shortText: Holder to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: short ball on middle, and that's been flicked to deep midwicket off his hips
yorker on middle, and he shovels this to long on for a single
back of a length on off, and he mistimes a pull over square leg for a single
back of a length on off, and he nudges it into the vacant midwicket region
